      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args) 
      static void setMetaFromMDS(boolean doAll, boolean doCoord)
      In SNWStation 1) set the latitude, longitude, elevation,description if bad or doall 2) If any channel is expected, set the expected snw groups on, if not clear it 3) Set the disable monitor flag based on disable, and disableExpires in snwstation
      static void updateChannelResponseFromMetadata()
      For every channel, transfer the metdata data server flags, indicate if there is current metadata for the channel (an open epoch) The user must have set up JDBCConnections (or DBConnections) with names 'meta' and 'edge'
      static void updateTriplet()
      This main Updates the channel table in edge with rates, NSN triplets, and adds new channels.

      • UpdateFromMetadata

    • Method Detail

      • updateChannelResponseFromMetadata

        public static void updateChannelResponseFromMetadata()
        For every channel, transfer the metdata data server flags, indicate if there is current metadata for the channel (an open epoch) The user must have set up JDBCConnections (or DBConnections) with names 'meta' and 'edge'

      • setMetaFromMDS

        public static void setMetaFromMDS(boolean doAll,
                                  boolean doCoord)
        In SNWStation 1) set the latitude, longitude, elevation,description if bad or doall 2) If any channel is expected, set the expected snw groups on, if not clear it 3) Set the disable monitor flag based on disable, and disableExpires in snwstation
        Parameters:
        doAll - If true, all of the station are updated with geographic, descriptions
        doCoord - Update coordinates in snwstation from STASRV

      • updateTriplet

        public static void updateTriplet()
        This main Updates the channel table in edge with rates, NSN triplets, and adds new channels.

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
